parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Eden Entity]] based on its [[Eden ID]]. If the ID points to a layer or a comment, the ID will be returned instead.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENEntity''' id
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] - [[Eden ID]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Eden Entity]] (when the target is [[Eden Entity]]) or [[Number]] (when the target is a layer or a comment)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myEntity = [[get3DENEntity]] 1</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[get3DENEntityID]]
</value></part></template></root>
